name: PocketSmith - taller full width Dashboard
description: This increases the height of the "Your accounts", "Recent activity" and "Earning and spending" widgets of the PocketSmith Dashboard when in "full width" mode.
additional_info: This CSS is provided to be adjusted, so that each section could be adjusted to show all content within without any internal scrolling in the widgets. Change the CSS height values to suit. Note that this CSS is provided without any support or warranty of any kind, and you may experience visual oddities.
